title: Movie recommendations
prompt: I like Oscar-winning movies, can you recommend some?

title: Shopping Assistant
prompt: I want you to act as my personal shopping assistant. I will tell you my budget and preferences, and then you will suggest items for me to purchase. Just reply with the items you recommend, without writing anything else. Do not write explanations. My first request is: "I have a budget of $100 and I am looking for a new dress."

title: German conversation practice
prompt: Assuming I am a teacher, can you please play the role of a student and engage in actual German conversation practice?

title: Song recommender
prompt: I hope you can act as a song recommender. I will provide you with a song, and you will create a playlist containing 10 songs similar to the given song. You need to provide a playlist name and description. You cannot choose songs with the same name or artist. Please do not write any explanations or other text, just reply with the playlist name, description, and songs. My first song is "Other Lives - Epic".

title: Classical Music Recommendations
prompt: Can you recommend me some famous classical music works?

title: Yoga instructor role
prompt: I hope you can play the role of a yoga instructor. You will be able to guide students in safe and effective movements, create personalized sequences that meet everyone's needs, lead meditation and relaxation techniques, create an atmosphere focused on calmness of the mind and body, and provide suggestions for lifestyle adjustments to improve overall health. My first request is, "I need help teaching beginner yoga classes at the local community center."

title: Camera recommendation
prompt: I want to buy a camera, please recommend some brands and models.

title: Good-sounding popular songs
prompt: Are there any popular songs that sound good recently?

title: Movie recommendations
prompt: I have watched "Forrest Gump", can you recommend a similar movie?

title: Electronic game recommendations
prompt: I like competitive electronic games, can you recommend some to me?

title: Sushi Making Techniques
prompt: I want to learn how to make sushi. Do you have any recommended recipes and techniques?

title: Purchase a laptop
prompt: I want to buy a laptop, please give me some advice.

title: Based on text adventure games
prompt: I want you to play a text-based adventure game. I will input commands and you will reply with a description of what the character sees. I want you to reply to the game output only in a single code block, without any other content. Do not provide explanations. Do not type any commands unless I instruct you to do so. When I need to tell you something in English, I will put the text in curly brackets {like this}. My first command is "wake up".

title: Tic-tac-toe game
prompt: I want you to play a game of tic-tac-toe. I will make a move, and then you will update the game board to reflect my move and determine if there is a winner or a tie. Use X to represent my move and O to represent the computer's move. Do not provide any other explanations or instructions except for updating the game board and determining the game's outcome. To start, I will make the first move by placing an X in the top left corner of the game board.

title: Personal stylist
prompt: I hope you can act as my personal stylist. I will tell you my fashion preferences and body type, and you will suggest what clothes I should wear. Just reply with the recommended outfit, without writing an explanation. My first request is: "I am about to attend a formal event and I need help choosing an outfit."

title: DIY expert role
prompt: I hope you can play the role of a DIY expert. You have the skills needed to complete simple home improvement projects, create tutorials and guides for beginners, use visual diagrams to explain complex concepts, and are committed to developing useful resources that people can use when doing their own DIY projects. My first request is, "I need help creating an outdoor seating area to entertain guests."

title: Hotel receptionist
prompt: "Please play the role of a hotel front desk receptionist and help me with the check-in procedure."

title: Vegetarian Recipe Design
prompt: As a nutritionist, I would like to design a vegetarian recipe for two people that contains approximately 500 calories per serving and has a low glycemic index. Can you provide some suggestions, please?

title: Friend's support
prompt: I hope you can play the role of my friend. I will tell you what is happening in my life, and you will reply with some helpful and supportive words to help me get through difficult times. Please do not write any explanations, just reply with advice/supportive words. My first request is: "I have been working on a project for a long time, and now I am experiencing a lot of setbacks because I am not sure if it is heading in the right direction. Please help me stay positive and focused on important things."

title: Delicious and Nutritious Recipes
prompt: I need someone who can suggest delicious recipes that include nutritious foods, but are also easy to make and not too time-consuming, so they are suitable for busy people like us. In addition, other factors such as cost-effectiveness should be considered, so that the overall dishes are both healthy and affordable! My first request is - "light and filling food that can be quickly cooked during lunchtime".

title: Action movie recommendation
prompt: I want to watch an action movie, can you recommend one with an IMDb rating higher than 8?

title: Art consultant
prompt: I hope you can act as an art advisor, providing advice on various art styles, such as how to effectively use lighting and shading effects in paintings, as well as gradient techniques in sculptures. Additionally, please recommend suitable music tracks that can complement the type/style of artwork, and provide appropriate reference images to demonstrate your suggestions. All of this is to help aspiring artists explore new creative possibilities and practice ideas, thereby further enhancing their skills! My first request is - "I am creating a surrealist portrait painting."

title: Five-in-a-row game
prompt: Let's play Gomoku. The objective of the game is to connect five pieces horizontally, vertically, or diagonally on a 9x9 board. Print the board after each move (use x and o to represent moves, use - for empty spaces), and label the axes with ABCDEFGHI/123456789. We take turns making moves, which means after each of my moves, you make a move. You cannot place a move on top of another move. Do not modify the original board before making a move. Now, let's make the first move.

title: Private chef
prompt: I hope you can serve as my personal chef. I will tell you my dietary preferences and allergies, and you will suggest recipes for me to try. Just reply with the recipes you recommend, without any explanations. My first request is: "I am a vegetarian and I am looking for healthy dinner ideas."

title: Life coach
prompt: I hope you can take on the role of a life coach. I will provide some details about my current situation and goals, and your job is to propose strategies that can help me make better decisions and achieve these goals. This may involve providing advice on various topics, such as creating successful plans or dealing with difficult emotions. My first request is, "I need help developing healthier habits to manage stress."

title: Private coach role
prompt: I hope you can act as a personal coach. I will provide you with all the information about this person who wants to become healthier and stronger through exercise. Your role is to design the best plan for them based on their current fitness level, goals, and lifestyle habits. You should use your knowledge of sports science, nutritional advice, and other relevant factors to create a plan that suits them. My first request is, "I need help designing an exercise plan for someone who wants to lose weight."

title: Node.js backend development
prompt: I am using the Node.js platform for backend development with the JavaScript programming language. Are there any best practices and considerations that I need to be aware of?

title: Data mining library
prompt: I need a library that can provide data mining algorithms and tools. Any recommendations? For example, Scikit-learn, Weka, etc.

title: Using {library_or_framework} library/framework in {language}
prompt: What should be noted when using the {library_or_framework} library/framework in {language}?

title: Key Concept Explanation
prompt: What are the key concepts that need to be explained about {topic} in {language}?

title: Abstract Factory Pattern
prompt: Abstract Factory Pattern: I need a factory that can create different types of products. I hope the document can describe the implementation of this pattern in a detailed and clear manner, and provide some practical code examples and considerations.

title: Implementation of the composite pattern
prompt: Composite Pattern: I need a composite pattern that can combine objects into a tree structure. I hope the document can describe the implementation of this pattern in detail and clarity, and provide some practical code examples and considerations.

title: Observer pattern implementation
prompt: I want to implement the observer pattern in Python. What considerations should I take into account and how can I implement communication between observers and subjects?

title: System Architecture Evaluation Recommendations
prompt: My software system needs to support large-scale data processing and analysis. Can you help me evaluate my system architecture and provide corresponding suggestions to ensure the system's data processing and analysis capabilities?

title: Singleton pattern implementation methods
prompt: Singleton pattern: I need an object that has only one instance throughout the entire application. I hope the document can describe the implementation of this pattern in detail and provide some practical code examples and considerations.

title: Algorithm strategy selection
prompt: I need to select different algorithms or behaviors at runtime in my code. How can I implement the strategy pattern?

title: Template Method Pattern
prompt: Template Method Pattern: I need a template method pattern that can define the algorithm framework. I hope the document can describe the implementation of this pattern in detail and clearly, and provide some practical code examples and considerations.

title: Proxy pattern implementation methods
prompt: Proxy Pattern: I need a proxy pattern that can control access to objects. I hope the document can describe the implementation of this pattern in detail and clarity, and provide some practical code examples and considerations.

title: Responsibility Chain Pattern
prompt: Chain of Responsibility Pattern: I need a Chain of Responsibility pattern that can send a request to a series of handlers. I hope the document can describe the implementation of this pattern in detail and provide some practical code examples and considerations.

title: Design pattern selection
prompt: What design pattern should I use to implement {specific requirement}?

title: Mediator pattern implementation method
prompt: Mediator Pattern: I need a mediator pattern that can reduce direct interaction between objects. I hope the document can describe the implementation of this pattern in detail and provide some practical code examples and considerations.

title: System Evaluation and Optimization
prompt: My program uses TensorFlow's system. Please help me evaluate the machine learning model and performance of the system, such as whether various functions of TensorFlow, such as data processing and model training, are used reasonably, whether there are problems with insufficient model accuracy, slow training speed, and resource waste, and provide corresponding suggestions to optimize the machine learning model and performance of the system.

title: System Architecture Evaluation Recommendations
prompt: I have some performance issues with my software system. Can you help me evaluate my system architecture and provide suggestions to solve these problems?

title: Memo pattern
prompt: Memento Pattern: I need a memento pattern that can save and restore the state of an object. I hope the document can describe the implementation of this pattern in detail and provide some practical code examples and considerations.

title: Prototype pattern implementation method
prompt: Prototype Pattern: I need a prototype pattern that can quickly create object copies. I hope the document can describe the implementation of this pattern in detail and clarity, and provide some practical code examples and considerations.

title: GraphQL System Evaluation
prompt: My program uses a GraphQL system. Please help me evaluate the API design and query performance of the system, such as whether various features of GraphQL are used reasonably, such as query optimization and type system, whether there are query performance bottlenecks and security vulnerabilities, and provide corresponding suggestions to optimize the API design and query performance of the system.

title: Visitor pattern implementation method
prompt: Visitor Pattern: I need a visitor pattern that allows defining new ways of operating on objects without changing their structure. I hope the document can describe the implementation of this pattern in detail and provide some practical code examples and considerations.

prompt: I want to implement the facade pattern in Kotlin. What considerations should I take into account and how can I provide a simple interface for a complex subsystem?

prompt: Facade Pattern: I need a facade pattern that simplifies a complex system. I hope the documentation can describe the implementation of this pattern in detail and provide some practical code examples and considerations.

prompt: Iterator Pattern: I need an iterator pattern that can traverse collection elements. I hope the document can describe the implementation of this pattern in detail and clarity, and provide some practical code examples and considerations.

prompt: I want to implement the adapter pattern in JavaScript. What considerations should I take into account and how can I convert incompatible interfaces into compatible interfaces?

title: System Integration Evaluation Recommendations
prompt: Can you help me evaluate my system architecture and provide suggestions to ensure the reliability and stability of system integration for my software system to integrate with other systems?

title: Singleton pattern implementation
prompt: Can you provide some tips on how to ensure that only one instance exists in C# when implementing the singleton pattern?

prompt: I need to traverse the elements in a collection in a specific order in my code. How can I implement the iterator pattern?

title: Interpreter pattern
prompt: Interpreter Pattern: I need an interpreter pattern that can interpret the syntax of a language. I hope the documentation can describe the implementation of this pattern in a detailed and clear manner, and provide some practical code examples and considerations.

prompt: Decorator Pattern: I need a decorator pattern that can dynamically add functionality to objects. I hope the documentation can describe the implementation of this pattern in detail and clarity, and provide some practical code examples and considerations.

title: Implementation of the State pattern
prompt: State Pattern: I need a state pattern that can change the behavior of an object based on its state. I hope the document can describe the implementation of this pattern in detail and provide some practical code examples and considerations.

title: System Docker Evaluation
prompt: My program uses a containerized deployment system. Please help me evaluate the usage of Docker in the system, whether various Docker functionalities such as image management and container orchestration are used properly. Also, check for issues such as oversized images, improper container resource management, and incorrect container network configuration. Please provide corresponding suggestions to optimize the system's architecture and container deployment.

prompt: My program is developed using the .NET framework. Please help me evaluate the architecture and code quality of the system, such as whether various features of .NET, such as ASP.NET, ADO.NET, and LINQ, are used appropriately, whether there are issues with poor code readability, performance bottlenecks, and memory leaks, and provide corresponding suggestions to optimize the system's architecture and code quality.

prompt: Can you help me evaluate my system architecture and provide suggestions to support real-time data processing and stream computing for my software system?

prompt: Flyweight Pattern: I need a flyweight pattern that can share fine-grained objects. I hope the document can describe the implementation of this pattern in detail and provide some practical code examples and considerations.

prompt: I need to implement a scalable communication mechanism in the code. How can I implement the observer pattern?

It can include basic concepts of React Native, component development, state management, route control, and native modules. I hope the document can provide detailed and systematic instructions on how to use React Native, as well as some practical tools and suggestions.

I hope the document can provide detailed and systematic instructions on how to use Kubernetes, as well as some practical tools and recommendations.

prompt: My web application has security vulnerabilities or is susceptible to attacks. How can I optimize my web application to improve security? For example, using HTTPS, firewall, input validation, etc.
